review: Works exactly as advertised. I have Prime, so most movies are free except for new releases. I had Netflix prior to this, but am going to close my Netflix account! Extremely easy set up - is already registered if you are purchasing for yourself. Automatically finds your wireless network, all you have to do is enter the pass code. With the voice remote, even my non-tech savvy hubby can find a movie!
author: Amazon Customer
